thread.title: win rugby world cup 2015 tickets and special prizes
thread.title_full: win rugby world cup 2015 tickets and special prizes - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: win rugby world cup 2015 tickets and special prizes
text: As a Worldwide Partner of Rugby World Cup 2015, MasterCard is offering Telegraph readers the chance to win tickets and tours to Rugby World Cup 2015. These fantastic prizes include: Draw 1: Tickets to New Zealand v Tonga • Three winners: each winner will receive two tickets to New Zealand v Tonga at St James’ Park on 9 October. Each winner and guest will also have the option of attending the Captain’s Run, which takes place on 7 October. Closing date: 23:59, Tuesday 29 September Draw 2: Tickets to Australia v Wales or England v Uruguay • One winner: two tickets to Australia v Wales at Twickenham on 10 October. • Two winners: each winner will receive two tickets to England v Uruguay at Manchester City Stadium on 10 October. Closing date: 23:59, Sunday 4 October Draw 3: Tickets to Quarter Final 1 or Quarter Final 2 • Two winners: each winner will receive two tickets to Quarter Final 1 (winner of Pool B v runner-up of Pool A) at Twickenham on 17 October. Each winner and guest will also have the option of attending the winner of Pool B Captain’s Run, which takes place on 16 October. • One winner: two tickets to the Quarter Final 1 (winner of Pool B v runner-up of Pool A) at Twickenham on 17 October. The winner will also have the option of a Twickenham stadium tour for two on 15 October. • One winner: two tickets to Quarter Final 2 (winner of Pool C v runner-up of Pool D) at Millennium Stadium on 18 October. • One winner: two tickets to Quarter Final 2 (winner of Pool C v runner-up of Pool D) at Millennium Stadium on 18 October. The winner will also meet the Man of the Match and present him with this award. Closing date: 23:59, Wednesday 7 October Draw 4: Tickets to Quarter Final 3 or Quarter Final 4 • One winner: two tickets to Quarter Final 3 (winner of Pool D v runner-up of Pool C) at Millennium Stadium on 18 October. • One winner: two tickets to Quarter Final 4 (winner of Pool A v runner-up of Pool B) at Twickenham on 18 October. Closing date: 23:59, Sunday 11 October Draw 5: Tickets to Semi Final 2 • One winner: two tickets to Semi Final 2 (winner of Quarter Final 3 v winner of Quarter Final 4) at Twickenham on 25 October. Closing date: 23:59, Sunday 18 October Draw 6: Tickets to Bronze Final • Two winners: each winner will receive two tickets to the Bronze Final (loser of Semi-Final 1 v loser of Semi-Final 2) at The Stadium at Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park on 30 October. Each winner and guest will also have the option of attending the Captain’s Run, which takes place on 29 October. Closing date: 23:59, Wednesday 21 October To enter this fantastic prize draw, complete the form below before: Online Form - Win Rugby World Cup 2015 tickets and special prizes with MasterCard telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
